actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Council on Wage and Price Stability Act to provide the Council the authority to issue subpoenas and to delay inflationary wage or price increases.

summary.text: Provides, under the Council on Wage and Price Stability Act (P.L. 93-387), that the Council shall have authority to: (1) issue subpenas; and (2) issue orders delaying for one period, not to exceed 60 days, the implementation of any wage or price increase which is likely to have a serious inflationary impact.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Council on Wage and Price Stability Act to provide the Council the authority to issue subpoenas and to delay inflationary wage or price increases.
